full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Title
Ultra-Low Temperature (ULT) Freezer Procurement
#### Title in French
Approvisionnement en congélateurs à ultra-basse température (ULT) pour le stockage sécurisé de matériaux sensibles à la température

### Identification
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01021762
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: 1000247039
- **Publication Date**: January 18, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 27, 2023, at 13:00:00

### Background
Health Canada (the Contracting Entity) invites prospective suppliers to participate in a competitive tender process to procure ultra-low temperature (ULT) freezers for secure storage of temperature-sensitive materials.

### Tender Status
The tender has been expired.

### Contracting Entity Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada
- **Address**: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, CA

### Procurement Details
The Contracting Entity requires five (13) ULT freezers, model MDF-DU702VXC-PA. The mandatory technical criteria for the freezers are:

- Door-mounted microprocessor with display for monitoring and controlling various functions.
- CFC-Free urethane foam insulation.
- Internal capacity between 25 and 28 cubic feet.
- Minimum interior dimensions of 34.3 inches in width, 23.6 inches in depth, and 55.1 inches in height.
- Maximum exterior dimensions of 40.6 inches in width, 36.8 inches in depth, and 78.5 inches in height.
- Less than 12.0 square feet of occupied space.
- Internal temperature control range between -50°C and -86°C.
- Cooling performance of <-65°C.
- Dual-compressor refrigeration system (Auto-Cascade).
- External door lock for use with padlock.
- Redundant dual-compressor refrigeration system.
- Platinum temperature sensor (Pt-1000).
- Priority for delivery on or before March 31, 2023.

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender evaluation will be based on the price of the offer. The Contracting Entity will award a contract to the responsive bidder holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the
